name: University of Vermont Health Network - Heart & Vascular
address: Multiple locations across Vermont and northern New York, including Burlington, VT 05401
description: Offers a full spectrum of cardiovascular services, including advanced imaging and stress testing, cardiac rehabilitation, and cardiothoracic surgery. They have specialized centers for aortic diseases and pediatric cardiology
services: Catholic-owned Cardiac testing in Vermont consultation

name: Rutland Heart Center (Rutland Regional Medical Center)
description: Provides comprehensive cardiac care, including heart disease screening, diagnostic services, and treatment for various cardiac conditions. They offer services like cardiac stress tests, CT scans, and echocardiograms
services: Catholic-owned Cardiac testing in Vermont consultation

name: Southwestern Vermont Medical Center (SVMC) - Cardiology and Vascular Surgery
description: Offers cardiac consultations, cardiac rehabilitation, and diagnostic tests like echocardiograms and stress testing. They collaborate with Dartmouth Hitchcock Medical Center for specialized vascular surgery. SVMC also offers a cardiac calcium scoring screening
services: Catholic-owned Cardiac testing in Vermont consultation

name: Northeastern Vermont Regional Hospital (NVRH) - Cardiology
description: Provides inpatient and outpatient cardiology consults, with tests such as electrocardiograms, holter monitoring, echocardiograms, and rest/exercise heart imaging services available on-site
services: Catholic-owned Cardiac testing in Vermont consultation

name: Brattleboro Memorial Hospital (BMH) Medical Group - Center for Cardiovascular Health
description: Offers a single point of service for heart disease and vascular disease care, including diagnosis, treatment, and rehabilitation. They utilize state-of-the-art diagnostic tools and have a board-certified cardiologist and nurse practitioners
services: Catholic-owned Cardiac testing in Vermont consultation

name: Catholic Medical Center (New Hampshire, but serves some Vermont patients)
description: While located in New Hampshire, CMC's New England Heart & Vascular Institute is a leading center for cardiovascular care and may serve patients from nearby Vermont. They offer advanced imaging, interventional cardiology, and cardiac surgery
services: Catholic-owned Cardiac testing in Vermont consultation

name: University of Vermont Medical Center - Cardiology Non-Invasive Testing
description: This specific department focuses on non-invasive diagnostic testing for cardiovascular conditions, including EKGs
services: Catholic-owned Cardiac testing in Vermont consultation

name: Central Vermont Medical Center - Cardiology Services
description: Offers a range of cardiac services, including diagnostic testing and treatment for heart conditions as part of the UVM Health Network
services: Catholic-owned Cardiac testing in Vermont consultation

name: Porter Medical Center - Cardiology Services
description: Provides cardiac care and diagnostic services as part of the UVM Health Network, offering accessible care to the Middlebury community
services: Catholic-owned Cardiac testing in Vermont consultation

name: Alice Hyde Medical Center - Cardiology Services (New York, but serves nearby Vermont)
description: While in New York, this facility serves residents in northern Vermont and offers cardiology services as part of the UVM Health Network
